content.description:
This question involves processing strings of text.

Consider the following variables.

colWidth  is an  int  variable with a positive value.

text  is a  String  variable with a non-null  value.

otherText  is a  String  variable with a non-null  value.
content.question:
A code segment, which you will write, should print the length of the longest prefix of the  text  that is a substring of  otherText.  A prefix is a substring that occurs at the beginning of another string.

The intended behavior is illustrated in the following table.

Value of
text
Value of
otherText
Printed
Output
Explanation
"apple"
"pear"
1
The prefix  "a"  is a substring of  "pear",  but  "ap"  is not.
"apple"
"pineapple"
5The prefixes  "a",  "ap",  "app",  "appl",  and  "apple"  are substrings of  "pineapple".  The length of the longest substring is  5.
"apple"
"happy"
3The prefixes  "a",  "ap",  and  "app"  are substrings of "happy". The length of the longest substring is  3.
"apple"
"leek"
0No prefix of  "apple"  is a substring of  "leek".

Write a code segment to print the intended output. Your implementation must meet all specifications and conform to the examples shown in the table.

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
